Package com.carrentalsystem.dao

Interface ICarLeaseRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl
public interface ICarLeaseRepository
The ICarLeaseRepository interface defines methods for interacting with the car rental system's data repository.

    • addCar

      void addCar(Vehicle car) throws SQLException
      Adds a new car to the repository.
      Parameters:
      car - The car to add
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • removeCar

      void removeCar(int carID) throws CarNotFoundException, SQLException
      Removes a car from the repository.
      Parameters:
      carID - The ID of the car to remove
      Throws:
      CarNotFoundException - if the specified car is not found
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • returnCar

      List<Lease> returnCar(int leaseID) throws LeaseNotFoundException, SQLException
      Returns a leased car and completes the lease.
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease to return
      Returns:
      A list of leases containing the returned lease
      Throws:
      LeaseNotFoundException - if the specified lease is not found
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • findLeaseById

      boolean findLeaseById(int leaseID) throws LeaseNotFoundException, SQLException
      Checks if a lease exists with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease to check
      Returns:
      true if the lease exists, otherwise false
      Throws:
      LeaseNotFoundException - if the specified lease is not found
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • calculateLeaseCost

      double calculateLeaseCost(int leaseID) throws SQLException, LeaseNotFoundException
      Calculates the cost of a lease.
      Parameters:
      leaseID - The ID of the lease
      Returns:
      The calculated cost of the lease
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
      LeaseNotFoundException - if the specified lease is not found

    • recordPayment

      void recordPayment(int paymentID, int leaseID, float amount, Date paymentDate) throws SQLException
      Records a payment in the repository.
      Parameters:
      paymentID - The ID of the payment
      leaseID - The ID of the associated lease
      amount - The amount of the payment
      paymentDate - The date of the payment
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • retrievePaymentHistory

      List<Payment> retrievePaymentHistory(int customerID) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the payment history for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer
      Returns:
      A list of payments made by the customer
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • calculateTotalRevenue

      double calculateTotalRevenue() throws SQLException
      Calculates the total revenue generated from payments.
      Returns:
      The total revenue
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
